name: Dasvidaniya
summary_text: A man who loves to make "to-do lists" makes one last bucket list when he realizes he is about to die.

name: Battle in Heaven
summary_text: Marcos lusts after his boss's promiscuous daughter, but after botching an extortion scheme, he becomes wracked with guilt.

name: Give 'em Hell Malone
summary_text: A tough as nails private investigator (Malone) squares off with gangsters and their thugs to protect a valuable secret. Malone goes through hell to protect the information but he dishes some hell as well...

name: The Yacoubian Building
summary_text: Meditations on corruption, fundamentalism, prostitution, homosexuality, and drugs in central Cairo.

name: Delirious
summary_text: An offbeat drama focused on a homeless youth, a pop music siren and a member of the paparazzi.

name: Pound of Flesh
summary_text: A man's heroic attempt to help a woman in distress ends up with him waking up the next day without a kidney and plotting his revenge.

name: Mission London
summary_text: A concert to celebrate Bulgaria joining the EU is being planned at the Embassy in London and it is the job of VARADIN, the new ambassador, to ensure the Queen attends. But with corrupt ...                See full summary »

name: O Ano em Que Meus Pais Saíram de Férias
summary_text: A boy is left alone in a Jewish neighborhood in the year of 1970, where both world cup and dictatorship happen in Brazil.

name: Seance on a Wet Afternoon
summary_text: A medium and her husband stage a kidnapping in order for her to pretend to solve the crime and achieve fame.

name: The More the Merrier
summary_text: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington, two men and a woman share a single apartment and the older man plays Cupid to the other two.

name: LBJ
summary_text: Lyndon B. Johnson aligns himself with John F. Kennedy, rises to the Presidency, and deals with the civil rights struggles of the 1960s.

name: Still Life
summary_text: A town in Fengjie county is gradually being demolished and flooded to make way for the Three Gorges Dam. A man and woman visit the town to locate their estranged spouses, and become witness to the societal changes.

name: Einayim Petukhoth
summary_text: A married, Orthodox, Jerusalem butcher and Jewish father of four falls in love with his handsome, 22-year-old male apprentice, triggering the suspicions of his wife and the disapproval of his Orthodox community.

name: Monsieur Hire
summary_text: A recluse is accused of murdering a young woman simply because his neighbors think he is strange.

name: Nothing Sacred
summary_text: An eccentric woman learns she is not dying of radium poisoning as earlier assumed, but when she meets a reporter looking for a story, she feigns sickness again for her own profit.

name: China Moon
summary_text: Detective Kyle Bodine falls for Rachel Munro who is trapped in a violent marriage. After shooting her husband, Kyle reluctantly agrees to help hide the body, but Kyle's partner is showing an unusual flair for finding clues.

name: House Party 2
summary_text: When Kid's college money is stolen by a crooked music promoter, Play's solution is to stage the 'mutha' of all pajama parties. Starring Kid 'n Play and Martin Lawrence.

name: Arthur 2: On the Rocks
summary_text: Arthur loses his fortune for staying with Linda, right as the two were preparing to adopt a child. As their marriage suffers, Arthur plans for a way to get his money back, but first he must sober up and get a real job.

name: Misbehaviour
summary_text: A group of women hatch a plan to disrupt the 1970 Miss World beauty competition in London.

name: Otesánek
summary_text: A childless couple passes off an anthropomorphous tree stump as their baby, but things get out of hand when the thing comes to life and demands to be fed.

name: He Said, She Said
summary_text: TV viewers love seeing the two reporters with opposing views on the show "He Said, She Said". Womanizer Dan and Lorie fall for each other. Love?

name: Karnan
summary_text: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

name: Assassination
summary_text: While Korea is occupied by the Japanese Army in 1933, the resistance plans to kill the Japanese Commander. But their plan is threatened by a traitor within their group and also the enemies' forces are hunting them down.

name: Hooper
summary_text: Hollywood aging stuntman Sonny Hooper wants to prove that he's still got what it takes to be a great professional in this risky and under-recognized line of work.

name: Korkusuz Korkak
summary_text: Mulayim sert believes that he only has 6 month to live. So to avoid meeting his fate, he decides to re do his job status, carry a time bomb, and play Russian Roulette.

name: Dark Ride
summary_text: A group of six friends on a road trip stop off at an amusement park attraction named 'Dark Ride', unaware that a psychopath who brutally murdered two girls, has just escaped a mental institution and is seeking refuge there.

name: You Only Live Once
summary_text: The public defender's secretary and an ex-convict get married and try to make a life together, but a series of disasters sends their lives spiraling out of control.

name: 49th Parallel
summary_text: A World War II U-boat crew are stranded in northern Canada. To avoid internment, they must make their way to the border and get into the still-neutral U.S.

name: El Bola
summary_text: El Bola, a 12 year old boy a.k.a. "Pellet" is a 12 year old boy raised in a violent and sordid environment. Embarrassed by his family life, he avoids becoming close to classmates. The ...                See full summary »

name: City on Fire
summary_text: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewelry store.

name: Make It Happen
summary_text: Embarking on a journey to fulfill her dreams as a dancer, a young girl discovers a new style of dance that will prove to be the source of both conflict and self-discovery.

name: The Border
summary_text: A corrupt border Agent decides to clean up his act when an impoverished woman's baby is put up for sale on the black market.

name: Louis C.K.: Live at the Comedy Store
summary_text: Comedian Louis C.K. performs live at the Comedy store in LA.

name: The Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human
summary_text: An anthropologist from an alien planet provides voice-over commentary for a documentary at human courtship, mating, and reproduction.

name: Seconds Apart
summary_text: Seth and Jonah are twins with a dangerous ability: telekinesis. Things spiral out of control as their classmates die one by one. But jealousy soon divides them and they can no longer trust each other leading to a battle against themselves.

name: The Front Line
summary_text: A drama centered on the Korean War's final battle that will determine the border between north and south.

name: Millennium
summary_text: An NTSB investigator seeking the cause of an airline disaster meets a warrior woman from 1000 years in the future. She replaces the people from airplanes before they crash with corpses with the same features.

name: The Rutles: All You Need Is Cash
summary_text: Charts the adventures of the prefab four, possibly the most famous band of all time.

name: A Fish Tale
summary_text: Three children accidentally get turned into fish after drinking a potion made by an eccentric scientist. When the kids end up in the sea, they must find the antidote within 48 hours or remain as fish forever.

name: Our Man Flint
summary_text: When scientists use eco-terrorism to impose their will on the world by affecting extremes in the weather, Intelligence Chief Cramden calls in top agent Derek Flint.

name: Born Free
summary_text: The story of George and Joy Adamson and the orphaned lion cub, Elsa, they adopt.

name: Haute Cuisine
summary_text: The story of Danièle Delpeuch and how she was appointed as the private chef for François Mitterrand.

name: BloodRayne: The Third Reich
summary_text: Rayne joins a resistence group to fight against the Nazis during world war two.

name: Drive
summary_text: A notorious thief allies with a street racer for a grand heist involving an elaborate game of deceit with authorities, who have their own dirty secrets.

name: Gallows Hill
summary_text: After a family is involved in an accident, they take refuge in a secluded inn where they free a girl locked in a basement without knowing she's an ancient evil spirit.

name: The Oh in Ohio
summary_text: Priscilla Chase is a woman who has never had an orgasm.

name: Thoroughly Modern Millie
summary_text: Millie Dillmount comes to town in the roaring twenties to encounter flappers, sexuality, and white slavers.

name: Man-Thing
summary_text: Agents of an oil tycoon vanish while exploring a swamp marked for drilling. The local sheriff investigates and faces a Seminole legend come to life: Man-Thing, a shambling swamp-monster whose touch burns those who feel fear.

name: Compulsion
summary_text: Two wealthy law-school students go on trial for murder in this version of the Leopold-Loeb case.

name: The Claim
summary_text: A prospector who sold his wife and infant daughter in exchange for a mining claim, tries desperately to win them back as he helps to build the Pacific Railroad with a group of pioneer friends.

name: Dracula's Daughter
summary_text: When Countess Marya Zaleska appears in London, mysterious events occur leading Dr. Von Helsing to believe the Countess must be a vampire.

name: Prospero's Books
summary_text: The magician Prospero attempts to stop his daughter's affair with an enemy.

name: Beyond Outrage
summary_text: As the police launch a full-scale crackdown on organized crime, it ignites a national yakuza struggle between the Sanno of the East and Hanabishi of the West.

name: Anjaam
summary_text: Vijay falls in love Shivani and proposes her only to be rejected every time. However his love turns into an obsession and turns her life into a hell.

name: Cow Belles
summary_text: In order to learn how to be responsible, two wealthy teen sisters are forced to work in the family business by their exasperated father. When company funds goes missing, it's up to the girls to save the day.

name: Get a Clue
summary_text: A wealthy student with too much fashion sense, her equally rich friends, and her rival/superior from the school paper work together to solve the case when their teacher goes missing.

name: Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
summary_text: Ash Ketchum from Pallet Town is 10 years old today. This means he is now old enough to become a Pokémon Trainer. Ash dreams big about the adventures he will experience after receiving his first Pokémon from Professor Oak.

name: Witless Protection
summary_text: When a small-town sheriff witnesses what he believes to be an attempted kidnapping, his effort to save the beautiful damsel in distress sets him down a wild path of comic mishap.

name: Godzilla Raids Again
summary_text: Fishing scout pilots make a horrifying discovery when a new monster named Anguirus and a second Godzilla are found. The two monsters make their way towards Osaka as Japan can only brace for tragedy once more.

name: Force of Evil
summary_text: An unethical lawyer, with an older brother he wants to help, becomes a partner with a client in the numbers racket.

name: Music
summary_text: Zu is newly sober when she receives news that she is to become the sole guardian of her half-sister named Music, a young girl on the autism spectrum. The film explores two of Sia's favorite themes: finding your voice and creating family.

name: The Nut Job 2: Nutty by Nature
summary_text: Following the events of the first movie, Surly and his friends must stop Oakton City's Mayor from destroying their home to make way for a dysfunctional amusement park.

name: Lies and Alibis
summary_text: A man who runs an alibi service for adulterous husbands gets into a jam with a new client. In trying to remedy the situation, he must rely on an alluring woman who gets his heart racing.

name: Der Tunnel
summary_text: During the Cold War, Germany was divided into two states - East and West. This epic story tells about their dramatic connections.

name: P.S.
summary_text: An unfulfilled divorced woman gets the chance to relive her past when she meets a young man who appears to be her high school sweetheart who died many years before.

name: Blacula
summary_text: An ancient African prince, turned into a vampire by Dracula himself, finds himself in modern Los Angeles.

name: Mumbai Police
summary_text: ACP Antony is the only one who knows the truth behind ACP Aaryan's murder. Antony meets with an accident, losing his memory and is unable to reveal the killer. He is forced to investigate the murder again hoping that he remembers something.

name: Bekçiler Krali
summary_text: The story of a guard who revolts because of exploiting reeve and tradespeople. People start to think he has an uncle working in the ministry of the interior.

name: No Holds Barred
summary_text: A TV-network boss pits a wrestler called Zeus against a wrestler called Rip in a wrestling match.

name: Grotesque
summary_text: A doctor kidnaps a young couple and forces them into a game of torment that slowly extinguishes their hopes for survival.

name: Dracula 3000
summary_text: Count Dracula terrorizes the crew of a spaceship.

name: Matru ki Bijlee ka Mandola
summary_text: Harry is an industrialist who loves his daughter Bijlee, and the bond they share with Harry's man friday, Matru. Bijlee's plan to wed the son of a politician, however, brings twists and turns in the lives of Matru, Bijlee and Mandola.

name: Twelve Chairs
summary_text: Two gentlemen of fortune from the times of Imperial Russia are looking for an uncountable treasure at the dawn of the Soviet Union age.

name: Sissi - Die junge Kaiserin
summary_text: The second in a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the film chronicles the married life of the young empress as she tries to adjust to formal and strict life in the palace and an overbearing mother-in-law.

name: Jesse Stone: Stone Cold
summary_text: Jesse Stone (Selleck) is a New England police chief investigating a series of murders, in an adaptation of Robert B. Parker's novel.

name: Shock and Awe
summary_text: A group of journalists of the Knight-Ridder news service covering President George W. Bush's planned invasion of Iraq in 2003 are skeptical of the President's claim that Saddam Hussein has "weapons of mass destruction."

name: Ajami
summary_text: Ajami is the religiously mixed community of Muslims and Christians in Tel Aviv. These are five stories about the everyday life in Ajami.

name: Cahill U.S. Marshal
summary_text: A tough Marshal has a difficult task when his two sons join a gang and rob a bank.

name: Psycho Goreman
summary_text: After unearthing a gem that controls an evil monster looking to destroy the Universe, a young girl and her brother use it to make him do their bidding.

summary_text: Stig Helmer takes another vacation with his Norwegian friend Ole. This time it's time for a skiing vacation in the Alps. Of course, Stig Helmer has never learned downhill skiing, but he ...                See full summary »

name: Konferenz der Tiere
summary_text: A group of animals waiting for the annual flood they rely on for food and water discover that the humans, who have been destroying their habitats have built a dam for a leisure resort.

name: Blithe Spirit
summary_text: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

name: Flavors of Youth
summary_text: Three different stories of youth set in different cities of China.

name: The Scarlet Empress
summary_text: A German noblewoman enters into a loveless marriage with the dim-witted, unstable heir to the Russian throne, then plots to oust him from power.

summary_text: Japanese troops round up Chinese and Russian prisoners of war and take them to unit 731, where they're horribly tortured and experimented on to test new biological weapons.

summary_text: During the Japanese colonial era, roughly 400 Korean people, who were forced onto Battleship Island ("Hashima Island") to mine for coal, attempt to a dramatic escape.

name: Molière
summary_text: To satisfy his creditors, a witty actor reinvents himself as a satirical playwright, with uproarious, yet bittersweet, results.

name: Yol Arkadasim
summary_text: Seref takes a road trip where he will find the meaning of friendship and meet someone special on the way. A comedy about life.

name: Camelot
summary_text: The story of the marriage of England's King Arthur to Guinevere. The plot of illegitimate Mordred to gain the throne and Guinevere's growing attachment to Sir Lancelot, threaten to topple Arthur and destroy his "round table" of knights.

name: The Scout
summary_text: The story of a baseball scout who discovers a talented but troubled baseball player.

name: Jimmy's Hall
summary_text: During the Depression, Jimmy Gralton returns home to Ireland after ten years of exile in America. Seeing the levels of poverty and oppression, the activist in him reawakens and he looks to re-open the dance hall that led to his deportation.

summary_text: A young teenage boy sets out to find his missing father, only to discover that he's actually the mythical creature known as Bigfoot.

summary_text: Story of an 8 year old girl coping with a gruesome rape damaging her internally and affecting emotionally, trying to overcome all obstacles in the aftermath of the incident with a good support from those around her.

summary_text: While on a summer trip with her friends, Megan begins to feel the presence of Sophie, her twin sister who recently committed suicide.

name: Masti
summary_text: Bored of their wives, best friends, Meet, Prem and Amar, reunite after three years and decide to have an affair - but instead become the prime suspects in a murder investigation.

name: The Medusa Touch
summary_text: A telekinetic novelist causes disasters simply by thinking about them.

name: Drone
summary_text: Ideologies collide with fatal results when a military drone contractor meets an enigmatic Pakistani businessman.

summary_text: International man of mystery Diabolik and his sensual lover Eva Kant pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.

summary_text: A committed police officer is on a very dangerous mission to destroy the most corrupt person in the country, Siddharth Abhimanyu.

name: Trafic
summary_text: Mr. Hulot drives a recreational vehicle from Paris to Amsterdam in his usual comical, disastrous style.

name: Private School
summary_text: Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and 2 friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

name: Cha no aji
summary_text: A spell of time of a rural family's slightly surreal life.

name: Chung hang sei hoi
summary_text: A romantic and action packed story of three best friends, a group of high end art thieves, who come into trouble when a love-triangle forms between them.

name: Saajan

summary_text: A disgraced cop finds himself in a race against time to find a kidnap victim whose abductor he accidentally killed.

name: Dance with Me
summary_text: Rafael Infante (Chayanne) comes to Houston from Cuba to work at John Burnett's (Kris Kristofferson's) dance studio. He meets Ruby Sinclair (Vanessa Williams), a cute dance instructor there. Chemistry? Will John know he's Rafael's dad?

name: Within

summary_text: A desperate American couple discovers all is not what it seems when they uncover a high-stakes underground scam while traveling abroad. To expose the truth and get back to the U.S., they must risk their lives to save their daughter.

summary_text: A drama set in the American South, where a precocious, troubled girl finds a safe haven in the music and movement of Elvis Presley.

name: Ali Wong: Baby Cobra
summary_text: Ali Wong's stand up special delves into her sexual adventures, hoarding, the rocky road to pregnancy, and why feminism is terrible.

summary_text: An actor poses as a lawyer to help his sick friend, and problems develop.

name: Sex Is Zero
summary_text: At a South Korean university most students are busy having a good time. A 28 y.o. and his horny friends are always getting into hilarious situations. He likes a much younger, pretty girl but she likes someone else.

name: Holiday in Handcuffs
summary_text: A struggling artist working as waitress kidnaps one of her customers to bring home and meet her parents at Christmas.

name: The Emperor and the Assassin
summary_text: In pre-unified China, the King of Qin sends his concubine to a rival kingdom to produce an assassin for a political plot, but as the king's cruelty mounts she finds her loyalty faltering.

summary_text: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

name: Vengeance Is Mine

summary_text: An undertaker marries an old executioner's daughter and, although he doesn't like it, must continue the profession of his father-in-law after his retirement.

name: Primal

summary_text: In the tomb-like quiet of their ranch-style purgatory, a divorced husband and wife fight a wordless war while mourning an unspeakable mutual loss. A sadistic lover's ritual humiliation spawns both tenderness and revenge.

name: Embrace of the Vampire
summary_text: An 18-year-old college freshman is seduced by a handsome vampire lover who introduces her to a dark world of carnal desires.

summary_text: A bachelor party becomes a savage fight for survival when the groomsmen unwittingly unleash a fabled predator upon the festivities.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
summary_text: A slacker (Akshay Kumar) must impress a wealthy man to marry her daughter (Juhi Chawla).

summary_text: A writer goes through a tough period after the release of her latest book, as she gets involved with an obsessive admirer.

summary_text: A handsome sailor is drawn into a vortex of sibling rivalry, murder, and explosive sexuality.

name: Eating Out
summary_text: After getting dumped by his slutty girlfriend, Caleb falls in love with Gwen. However, thanks to Caleb's roommate, Gwen thinks he's gay and sets him up with her roommate, Marc.

name: Wendy Wu: Homecoming Warrior
summary_text: A Californian teenager learns that she is the reincarnation of a legendary female warrior destined to protect the world.

summary_text: The teenagers of Disney's most infamous villains return to the Isle of the Lost to recruit a new batch of villainous offspring to join them at Auradon Prep.

name: Turks & Caicos
summary_text: Worricker is a retired spy living in the Caribbean. He realizes he is in trouble when four "businessmen" show up. They look like mob bosses, but one actually works for the CIA. He gets help from two former MI5 colleagues back in London.

name: Deiji
summary_text: About a tragic love triangle story involving young painter Hye-young, Interpol detective Jeong Woo, and professional hitman Park Yi.

name: Dirty Dancing
summary_text: A musical re-imagining of the 1987 film, Dirty Dancing (1987).

name: The Curse of the Cat People
summary_text: The young, friendless daughter of Oliver and Alice Reed befriends her father's dead first wife and an aging, reclusive actress.

name: Try Seventeen
summary_text: The story of a young man who enters college only to discover that he can learn more about life and love from his neighbors in the apartment building where he lives.

name: The Single Moms Club
summary_text: When five struggling single moms put aside their differences to form a support group, they find inspiration and laughter in their new sisterhood, and help each other overcome the obstacles that stand in their way.

name: Any Day Now
summary_text: In the 1970s, a gay couple fights a biased legal system to keep custody of the abandoned mentally handicapped teenager that comes to live under their roof.

name: Lisbela e o Prisioneiro
summary_text: Lisbela is a young woman who loves going to the movies. Leléu is a con man, going from town to town selling all sort of things and performing as master of ceremonies for some cheesy numbers...                See full summary »

name: Temper
summary_text: Daya, a corrupt police officer, finds his life changing when he takes on a case of gang rape.

name: Kaakkaa Muttai
summary_text: Two slum kids yearn to taste a pizza after being enticed by the pizza shop that has opened near their locality. What happens when they mange to find the money to buy one?
One man's journey to the future to save a dying world.

name: Nuts
summary_text: A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.

name: BUtterfield 8
summary_text: A beautiful New York model and socialite and enjoys a very active night-life, but all things change when she falls for a married man and the consequences are tragic.

name: Women in Trouble
summary_text: A serpentine day in the life of ten seemingly disparate women: a porn star, a flight attendant, a psychiatrist, a masseuse, a bartender, a pair of call girls, etc. All of them with one crucial thing in common. Trouble.

name: A Second Chance
summary_text: A conscientious police officer who investigates a violent case of domestic dispute in the squalid apartment of a drug addict has to make the most contemptible decision in his life. Just how far would a parent go to get a second chance?

name: In Too Deep
summary_text: Right out of police academy, Jeff/Omar Epps starts as undercover cop in Cincinnati. First it's small time cases but he proves himself and moves up to a big case - befriending a brutal crime boss.

name: Lilting
summary_text: A young man of Chinese-Cambodian descent dies, leaving behind his isolated mother and his 4-year male lover, who grieve but don't speak a lick of each other's language.

name: Braddock: Missing in Action III
summary_text: Braddock mounts a one-man assault to free his wife and son who are still being held in a Vietnam prison camp.

name: Xin hai ge ming
summary_text: A historical drama based on the founding of the Republic of China when nationalist forces led by Sun Yat-sen overthrew the Qing Dynasty.

name: Padayappa
summary_text: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

name: Jesus Henry Christ
summary_text: At the age of ten, Henry James Herman, a boy who was conceived in a petri-dish and raised by his feminist mother, follows a string of Post-It notes in hopes of finding his biological father.

name: Ghidorah, the Three-Headed Monster
summary_text: A princess, targeted for assassination, prophecies the arrival of a space monster. Mothra must convince Godzilla and Rodan to set aside their hatred of humanity or face the powerful space monster by herself.

name: Twentieth Century
summary_text: A flamboyant Broadway impresario who has fallen on hard times tries to get his former lover, now a Hollywood diva, to return and resurrect his failing career.

name: Gemma Bovery
summary_text: Martin, an ex-Parisian well-heeled hipster passionate about Gustave Flaubert who settled into a Norman village as a baker, sees an English couple moving into a small farm nearby. Not only ...                See full summary »

name: Sparkle
summary_text: In the 1960s, three sisters form a girl group and soon become local sensations with major label interest, but fame becomes a challenge as the close-knit family begins to fall apart.

name: Club Paradise
summary_text: A retired Chicago firefighter partners with a reggae singer to turn a seedy Caribbean nightclub into a resort for affluent tourists.

name: Vorood-e-Aghayan Mamnoo
summary_text: This movie is about a strict girls high school whose faculties are all female. After the maternity leave of a chemistry teacher, the principal has to bent the rules for the presence of a male teacher in the girls high school.

name: No Tears for the Dead
summary_text: A hit man traumatized from accidentally killing a young girl during a job is given the mission to eliminate her mother, and begins the ultimate fight to save her life.

name: Girl 6
summary_text: An aspiring actress disappointed by her treatment in the movie industry turns to phone sex to make a living.

name: Being 17
summary_text: Damien lives with his mother Marianne, a doctor, while his father is on a tour of duty abroad. He is bullied by Thomas, whose mother is ill. The boys find themselves living together when Marianne invites Thomas to come and stay with them.

name: Sonbahar
summary_text: A man struggles after his release from ten years as a political prisoner.

name: The Trotsky
summary_text: A Montreal high school student who believes he is the reincarnation of Leon Trotsky starts a revolution against apathy among his fellow students.

name: Last Passenger
summary_text: A small group of everyday passengers on a speeding London commuter train battle their warped driver who has a dark plan for everyone on-board.

name: Robot Jox
summary_text: In the distant future, mankind has forsaken global wars for battles of single combat. The world has been divided into two opposing super powers, with each side represented by trained champions.

name: The Cheetah Girls 2
summary_text: The girl group return for more adventures, this time traveling to Spain to take part in a music festival.

name: Bluffmaster
summary_text: A conman Roy, gets dumped by his girl-friend. Then he finds out he has a fatal disease. On the verge of death, he resolves to do some good, by helping his apprentice Dittu hoodwink the mobster who hurt his (Dittu's) family.

name: Proxima
summary_text: An astronaut prepares for a one-year mission aboard the International Space Station.

name: The Saint
summary_text: International master thief, Simon Templar, also known as The Saint, is tasked to find a man's kidnapped daughter. In addition to evading the authorities, Simon must face a dangerous adversary from his past.

name: Séraphine
summary_text: Based on the life of French painter Séraphine de Senlis.

name: Frogs
summary_text: A group of helpless victims celebrate a birthday on an island estate crawling with killer amphibians, birds, insects, and reptiles.

name: Edge of Seventeen
summary_text: A teenager copes with his sexuality on the last day of school in 1984. It shows him coping with being gay and being with friends.

name: The Hills Have Eyes Part II
summary_text: A group of bikers, heading to a race, become stranded in the desert and find themselves fighting off a family of inbred cannibals who live off the land.

name: Treasure Island
summary_text: In 1765, young English boy Jim Hawkins gets involved with buccaneers during his quest to find pirate Captain Flint's treasure buried on a secret island.

name: Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah
summary_text: Time travelers use Godzilla in their scheme to destroy Japan to prevent the country's future economic reign.

name: Maryland
summary_text: Vincent is an ex-soldier with PTSD who is hired to protect the wife and child of a wealthy Lebanese businessman while he's out of town. Despite the apparent tranquility in Maryland, Vincent perceives an external threat.

name: Harbinger Down
summary_text: While studying the effects of global warming on a pod of whales, grad students on a crabbing vessel and its crew uncover frozen Soviet space shuttle and unintentionally release a monstrous organism from it.

name: How to Rob a Bank (and 10 Tips to Actually Get Away with It)
summary_text: Caught in the middle of a bank robbery, a slacker and a bank employee become the ones who arbitrate the intense situation.

name: Return to Halloweentown
summary_text: Marnie and Dylan are going to follow their dreams to go to college, at Halloweentown University, which is also known as Witch University.

name: How to Murder Your Wife
summary_text: A dedicated bachelor drunkenly marries a young woman and immediately lives to regret it.

name: Space Battleship Yamato
summary_text: In 2199, the crew of the space battleship Yamato embark on a dangerous journey to the planet Iskandar to acquire a device that will rejuvenate the war-ravaged Earth.

name: Saint Ralph
summary_text: Saint Ralph is the unlikely story of Ralph Walker, a ninth grader who outran everyone's expectations except his own in his bold quest of trying to win the 1954 Boston Marathon.

name: Don't Blink
summary_text: Ten people arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, the visitors are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge.

name: Last Exit to Brooklyn
summary_text: Set in Brooklyn during the 1950s against a backdrop of union corruption and violence. A prostitute falls in love with one of her customers. Also a disturbed man discovers that he is homosexual.

name: Amityville 3-D
summary_text: A reporter moves into the Amityville house in defiance of the supernatural events connected to it, and finds everyone around him besieged by the evil manifestations which are connected to a demonic presence in the basement.

name: Henry V
summary_text: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

name: Chasers
summary_text: A hapless Navy sailor is assigned SP duty. The catch: he must escort a beautiful female prisoner on her way to prison for going UA. She in turn will try anything to escape.

name: The Emigrants
summary_text: Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.

name: A Breath Away
summary_text: A family fight to survive as the streets of Paris fill with a deadly gas.

name: Nil Battey Sannata
summary_text: A story about a single women (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.

name: I Hired a Contract Killer
summary_text: After fifteen years' service, Henri Boulanger is made redundant from his job. Shocked, he attempts suicide, but can't go through with it, so he hires a contract killer in a seedy bar to ...                See full summary »

name: The Island of Dr. Moreau
summary_text: A shipwrecked survivor discovers a remote island owned by a crazed scientist who is carrying out sinister experiments on the island's inhabitants.

name: People Will Talk
summary_text: Dr. Noah Praetorius falls in love with Debra, a student who finds out that she is pregnant by her old boyfriend.

name: The Intervention
summary_text: A weekend getaway for four couples takes a sharp turn when one of the couples discovers the entire trip was orchestrated to host an intervention on their marriage.

name: YellowBrickRoad
summary_text: 1940: the entire population of Friar, New Hampshire walked up a winding mountain trail, leaving everything behind. 2008: the first official expedition into the wilderness attempts to solve the mystery of the lost citizens of Friar.

name: The Reckoning
summary_text: A priest on the lam takes up with a traveling band of actors, who then discover a murder has occurred and try to solve it by recreating the crime in a play.

name: Backbeat
summary_text: A dramatization of the Hamburg, Germany phase of The Beatles' early history.

name: Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest
summary_text: The Z-Fighters must stop a mad scientist out to take over the world.

name: Hello I Must Be Going
summary_text: Circumstances force a young divorcée to move back in with her parents in suburban Connecticut, where an affair with a younger guy rejuvenates her passion for life

name: The Hammer
summary_text: A 40-year-old who gave up a promising amateur boxing career 21 years ago is offered a path to the Olympics.

name: Barely Legal
summary_text: Three high school guys attempt to make a porno movie.

name: Raabta
summary_text: An inseparable couple Saira and Shiva find themselves in a complicated situation when a stranger claims to be her reincarnated lover from their previous lifetime, hellbent on destroying their relationship and winning her back.

name: The Young Karl Marx
summary_text: The early years of Karl Marx, Friedrich Engels and Jenny Marx, between Paris, Brussels and London.

name: Cass
summary_text: An orphaned Jamaican baby is adopted by an elderly white couple and brought up in an all white area of London and becomes one of the most feared and respected men in Britain. Based on a true story.

name: Live and Become
summary_text: A Christian boy escapes to Israel from famine-stricken Ethiopia by pretending to be Jewish.

name: The Hospital
summary_text: A hospital's chief-of-staff struggles to find meaning in his life during a spate of staff deaths.

name: Murder!
summary_text: A juror in a murder trial, after voting to convict, has second thoughts and begins to investigate on his own before the execution.

name: The Story of O
summary_text: Photographer O's lover takes her to a Château, where she is, like other women there, naked, humiliated by whipping, sexual abuse by men etc. When O leaves, her lover gives her to his much older step-brother.

name: Breakin' All the Rules
summary_text: Inspired by his fiancée (who dumped him), a man publishes a break-up hand-book for men, becoming a best-selling author in the process.
